name: ExecutionProject
comment: For order fulfillment and service order, or even for capability check of a corporate order, a project needs to be created to orchestrate that process. This entity stores the details of this execution Project. Examples of execution projects include:* Proposal level project* Delivery level project* Site Decomposition level project
vf short description: For order fulfillment and service order, or even for capability check of a corporate order, a project needs to be created to orchestrate that process. This entity stores the details of this execution Project.

fields.name: ExecutionProjectSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ValidFromDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity begin in EDWH

fields.name: ValidUntilDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity end in EDWH

fields.name: KeyTypeId
fields.comment: Key type of record

fields.name: ExecutionProjectKey
fields.comment: Unique identifier for the execution projects in aLDM. SC_PROJECT_ORDER_INSTANCE.OBJID//Generated Key on Execution Project Id

fields.name: RootExecutionProjectSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ParentExecutionProjectSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ProjectName
fields.comment: Name of the execution project. SC_PROJECT_ORDER_INSTANCE.NAME

fields.name: ErrorCount
fields.comment: Specifies the count of the errors present in the project error log. SC_PROJECT_ORDER_INSTANCE.ERROR_COUNTER

fields.name: StatusChangeDate
fields.comment: Indicates the last time the STATUS was changed SC_PROJECT_ORDER_INSTANCE.STATUS_CHANGE_DATE

fields.name: ScheduleFlag
fields.comment: Indicates whether the project has been scheduled.Values are:- 1=Yes- 0=No. SC_PROJECT_ORDER_INSTANCE.IS_SCHEDULED

fields.name: ExecutionProjectId
fields.comment: Indicates a unique identifier for a project in the source. SC_PROJECT_ORDER_INSTANCE.OBJID

fields.name: ProjectExternalId
fields.comment: Indicates the business Id of the project. Each project has a unique Project External Id. SC_PROJECT_ORDER_INSTANCE.ID

fields.name: VersionId
fields.comment: Number that describes the project instance version. The number starts from 1. SC_PROJECT_ORDER_INSTANCE.VERSION

fields.name: LatestVersionFlag
fields.comment: Values are:- 0 - Not the latest version of the project- 1 - The latest version of the project SC_PROJECT_ORDER_INSTANCE.IS_LATEST_VERSION

fields.name: PriorityInd
fields.comment: Indicates the priority of the project execution such as LOW, MED, or HIGH. SC_PROJECT_ORDER_INSTANCE.PRIORITY

fields.name: PointOfNoReturnFlag
fields.comment: Indicates that the project is at a stage from where it cannot be rolled back, or reversed. SC_PROJECT_ORDER_INSTANCE.IS_PONR

fields.name: ProjectStartDate
fields.comment: Indicates the actual date of the project. SC_PROJECT_ORDER_INSTANCE.START_DATE

fields.name: EstimatedDate
fields.comment: Indicates the date recalculated as a result of activity date completion. SC_PROJECT_ORDER_INSTANCE.CURRENT_ESTIMATED_DATE

fields.name: PlannedStartDate
fields.comment: Indicates the date on which a project is planned to start. SC_PROJECT_ORDER_INSTANCE.PLANNED_START_DATE

fields.name: PlannedCompletionDate
fields.comment: Indicates the date on which a project is planned to complete. SC_PROJECT_ORDER_INSTANCE.PLANNED_COMPLETE_DATE

fields.name: ProjectCompletionDate
fields.comment: Indicates the date on which a project was completed. SC_PROJECT_ORDER_INSTANCE.COMPLETION_DATE

fields.name: OssCreationDate
fields.comment: Indicates the source record creation date. SC_PROJECT_ORDER_INSTANCE.CREATE_DATE

fields.name: OssModificationDate
fields.comment: Record modification date in source. SC_PROJECT_ORDER_INSTANCE.LAST_UPDATED

fields.name: ProjectOrderActionTypeSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ExecutionProjectCategorySK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ExecutionProjectStatusSK
fields.comment: BI field: AI surrogate key

fields.name: ExecutionProjectConvergedStatusSK
fields.comment: BI field: AI surrogate key for converged attribute

fields.name: ExecutionProjectConvergedStatusDate
fields.comment: Indicates the date when the converged status changed.

fields.name: ExecutionReasonSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ProjectOrderSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: CustomerSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: FrameworkAgreementSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ProjectOwnerSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ManagerSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ExecutionProfileSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: OpportunitySK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ProposalSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: SourceSystemId
fields.comment: Represents the code of the source system that the leading entity of the current target is coming from. It is suffix also include the code of the DB instance on that system such that in case of multiple instances of the same source system are deployed (Scalability) it will be possible to trace the target to it is source system instance

fields.name: DeleteIndicator
fields.comment: Set to True when the leading source entity of this target entity was deleted in the source system

fields.name: RowUpdateTime
fields.comment: The time stamp when the row was written to the Target real-time/staging storage

fields.name: SourceUpdateTime
fields.comment: The latest create/update timestamp of any of the entities composing this target entity

fields.name: SourceQueryTime
fields.comment: The timestamp of reading the data from source system. - when using CDC it is usually similar to the latest update, in SQL cases it is the time of running the SQL. When a dummy target entity is created as a temporary entity to maintain referential integrity this indicator will be set to True. As soon as the real target entity is stored it will be stored with False dummy indicator value.

fields.name: DptiId
fields.comment: Counter which represents the cycle number of the job	is_deleted	boolean	is_deleted	Represents if the record is deleted. Is been updated after the compaction job

fields.name: PTime
fields.comment: Partition time based on the event time for target entities marked to be partitioned event time rounded the correct partition window (hourly, daily etc..)

fields.name: Insert_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which inserted the record in the table

fields.name: Update_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which updated the record in the table
